{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3026743,"name":"Viktor R.","username":"VoidVoyager","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/voidvoyager/{size}/167518_2.png","created_at":"2022-03-21T03:14:35.174Z","cooked":"

We’ve been assembling AndyMark’s climber in a box, and the motor shaft (for the spool/winch) that came with it seems to fall short of the distance it’s supposed to cover. The instructions are a bit vague and I was wondering if we’re doing this wrong?

image3024×4032 2.77 MB

You need to order the 2 inch shaft.

andymark.com

Blue Sport Gearbox 2 in. Output Shaft

This is an optional replacement output shaft for our CIM Sport, 57 Sport, Dual 775 Sport and Falcon Sport gearboxes. This shaft protrudes 2 in. from the face of the gearbox. If your application requires a slightly longer output shaft, you can...

Also watch the video on an website about tying the knot it shows how to bolt in the gearbox
